category_subtitle: Milan Cortina 2026 ‚Äî Let the Games Begin!

rounds.pro_tip: SNOW TEXTURE: Real snow has complex crystalline structure with subtle blue shadows. AI snow often looks like smooth white paint or cotton.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated ‚Äî Olympic rings monument in snowy mountain setting (Flux)
rounds.pro_tip: GEOMETRIC PRECISION: The Olympic rings have exact proportions. AI often distorts them ‚Äî uneven ring sizes, wrong overlap order, or incorrect colors.
ICE SURFACE: Real ice has natural scratches, embedded bubbles, and varied translucency. AI ice often looks like frosted glass with unrealistic clarity.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated ‚Äî figure skater mid-spin on Olympic ice (Midjourney)
rounds.pro_tip: BODY PROPORTIONS: Real athletes have natural body proportions even in dynamic poses. AI often elongates limbs, twists joints impossibly, or creates anatomical errors.
MOUNTAIN DETAIL: Real mountain photos show geological strata, erosion patterns, and varied vegetation. AI mountains are often too smooth or repetitively textured.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated ‚Äî ski jumper in mid-air against blue sky (DALL-E 3)
rounds.pro_tip: EQUIPMENT DETAILS: Real ski equipment has brand logos, specific bindings, and wear marks. AI gear tends to have blurry or invented brand names and physically impossible mechanisms.
LIGHTING CONSISTENCY: In real photos, all surfaces respond to the same light source. AI sometimes lights different parts of the scene from conflicting angles.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated ‚Äî Olympic torch bearer running through Italian village (Flux)
rounds.pro_tip: FIRE INTERACTION: Real torch flames interact with the runner's movement ‚Äî trailing, flickering. AI flames often sit static on the torch like a sticker.
ATMOSPHERIC PERSPECTIVE: In real landscape photos, distant objects appear hazier and bluer due to atmosphere. AI sometimes renders distant mountains as sharp as foreground objects.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated ‚Äî Olympic medal ceremony podium with flags (Midjourney)
rounds.pro_tip: FLAGS & SYMBOLS: Real flags have correct proportions, colors, and designs. AI frequently generates flags with wrong stripe counts, invented symbols, or impossible folds.
